N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.20 - Recreation

State Regulations
(a) There shall be provision for leisure
activities and planned recreation. (b) Recreation programs shall include sports
and cultural activities. (c) (1)

One designated staff member who has
currently authorized Water Safety Instructor's certificate from the American

Red Cross, or from an equivalent certifying organization, shall be responsible
for the general operation of a swimming pool or bathing beach operated by the
institution. (2)

Children
participating in swimming pool or bathing beach activities shall at all times
be supervised by at least one individual who has a currently authorized
certificate of advanced lifesaving or of Water Safety Instructor from the

American Red Cross or its equivalent from another certifying
organization. (3)

Additional safety
precautions shall be taken for children with special problems. Notes
